_header: He that no good can nor none will learn
_description: ‘Who shall him warne?’ — one long couplet

OxfBal354.Transcription:
He that no good can nor non will lernIf he newer thriwe who shall him
                    warne

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
